1.name: Opening Strike
1.desc: Cause vulnerability with your first strike when entering combat.

2.name: Alpha Training
2.desc: Pets have Opening Strike.

3.name: Precise Strike
3.desc: Opening Strike always critically hit.

1.name: Enlargement
1.desc: Use Signet of the Wild when your health drops below the threshold (25%).

2.name: Predator’s Instinct
2.desc: Apply cripple to foes you hit while they are below the health threshold (50%).

3.name: Beastmaster’s Bond
3.desc: Cast Call of the Wild when you swap pets.

1.name: Beastmaster’s Might
1.desc: Activating a signet refreshes your opening strike and grant might to you and your pet. Signets recharge 20% faster.

2.name: Steady Focus
2.desc: Damage is increased by 10% while endurance is full.

3.name: Moment of Clarity
3.desc: Gain an attack of opportunity for you and your pet on interrupting a foe. Daze and stun durations that you inflict last 100% longer.

1.name: Predator’s Onslaught
1.desc: You and your pet deal 10% bonus damage to enemies suffering from movement-impeding conditions or are dazed.

2.name: Remorseless
2.desc: Regain Opening Strike whenever you gain fury. Opening Strike deals 25% more damage.

3.name: Lead the Wind
3.desc: While wielding a longbow, your attack speed is increased by 10% and your arrows pierce. Longbow skills recharge 20% faster.

1.name: Tail Wind
1.desc: Gain swiftness when swapping weapons in combat.

2.name: Furious Grip
2.desc: Gain fury when swapping weapons in combat.

3.name: Hunter’s Tactics
3.desc: Deal 10% more damage while attacking from behind or the side.

1.name: Sharpened Edges
1.desc: You and your pet have a 66% chance to cause bleeding on critical hits.

2.name: Most Dangerous Game
2.desc: While your health is below the threshold (50%) your attacks gain power.

3.name: Trapper’s Defense
3.desc: Create a Spike Trap while reviving an ally.

1.name: Primal Reflexes
1.desc: When you successfully evade an attack gain vigor.

2.name: Spotter
2.desc: Increases precision of nearby allies by 150.

3.name: Trapper’s Expertise
3.desc: Conditions caused by traps last 100% longer. Your traps recharge 20% faster and affect a larger area.

1.name: Quick Draw
1.desc: When you swap weapons your next weapon skill used recharges 66% faster.

2.name: Light on your Feet
2.desc: Damage and condition duration is increased by 10% while moving. Shortbow skills recharge 20% faster and your arrows pierce.

3.name: Strider’s Defense
3.desc: 50% chance to destroy projectiles while executing a melee attack. Sword skills recharge 20% faster and you deal 10% more damage while wielding a sword.

1.name: Natural Vigor
1.desc: Increases 25% endurance regeneration.

2.name: Companion’s Defense
2.desc: You and your pet gain protection when you dodge roll.

3.name: Bark Skin
3.desc: You and your pet take 50% less damage while your health is above the threshold (90%).

1.name: Soften the Fall
1.desc: Create Muddy Terrain when you take falling damage. You take 50% less damage from falling.

2.name: Ambidexterity
2.desc: Gain 150 condition damage while wielding a torch or dagger. Torch and Dagger skills recharge 20% faster.

3.name: Expertise Training
3.desc: Pets deal 350 extra condition damage and have their condition durations increased by 20%.

1.name: Oakheart Salve
1.desc: Gain regeneration when you suffer from bleeding, poison or burning. While you have regeneration you take 5% reduced damage.

2.name: Peak Strength
2.desc: You and your pet deal 10% more damage while your health is above the threshold (90%).

3.name: Shared Anguish
3.desc: Incoming disabling conditions are transferred to your pet instead.

1.name: Empathic Bond
1.desc: Pets periodically take 3 condition from you (10s).

2.name: Wilderness Knowledge
2.desc: Use Sharpening Stone when you strike a foe below the health threshold (75%). Survival skills have 20% reduced recharge and remove 2 conditions.

3.name: Poison Master
3.desc: After swapping pets, your pet’s first attack will inflict poison; your poison damage is increased by 50%.

1.name: Rejuvenation
1.desc: Gain regeneration when you health drops below the threshold (75%).

2.name: Fortifying Bond
2.desc: Any boon you get is shared with your pet.

3.name: Lingering Magic
3.desc: Boons applied by your and your pets last longer.

1.name: Bountiful Hunter
1.desc: You and your pet deals 1% more damage per boon on you.

2.name: Nature’s Wrath
2.desc: Gain 10% power based on your healing. Your pet gains extra stats.

3.name: Healer’s Celerity
3.desc: Grant swiftness to yourself and your ally when you revive them. Increase revive sped by 10%.

1.name: Evasive Purity
1.desc: Dodging removes blindness, cripple, and poison from you.

2.name: Vigorous Training
2.desc: Pets grant vigor to nearby allies when you swap pets.

3.name: Windborne Notes
3.desc: Call of the Wild also grants Regeneration and Warhorn skills recharge 20% faster.

1.name: Nature’s Vengeance
1.desc: Activated skills of spirits are larger and trigger when the spirit is killed.

2.name: Protective Ward
2.desc: When you receive damage nearby foes are weakened and you gain protection

3.name: Invigorating Bond
3.desc: Your pet heals allies in an area when executing a command [F2] ability.

1.name: Instinctual Bond
1.desc: When you are downed, your pet gains quickness.

2.name: Loud Whistle
2.desc: Reduce recharge on pet skills and swapping by 20%.

3.name: Pet’s Prowess
3.desc: Pets move 30% faster and deal more damage on critical hits.

1.name: Companion’s Might
1.desc: Your critical hits grant might to your pet.

2.name: Rending Attacks
2.desc: Pets inflict bleeding when they critically hit with their basic attacks.

3.name: Resounding Timbre
3.desc: Shouts apply regeneration and swiftness to allies. Reduces recharge on shouts by 20%.

1.name: Wilting Strike
1.desc: Activated attack abilities for pets cause weakness. This effect will only once on each target affected by abilities.

2.name: Two-handed Training
2.desc: Greatsword and spear damage is increased by 5% and those skills recharge 20% faster. Greatsword and spear attacks have a 50% chance to grant fury on hit.

3.name: Natural Healing
3.desc: Your pet gains natural health regeneration and improved healing (+350).

1.name: Beastly Warden
1.desc: Your pet taunts foes near them when executing a command [F2] ability.

2.name: Zephyr’s Speed
2.desc: You and your pet gain might and quickness when you swap pets.

3.name: Honed Axes
3.desc: Gain 150 ferocity while wielding an axe in your main hand. Winter’s Bite is now AoE. Axe skills recharge 20% faster.
